# init(entries:)

**Initializer**

Creates a transcript.

## Declaration

```swift
init(entries: some Sequence<Transcript.Entry> = [])
```

## Parameters

- **entries**: An array of entries to seed the transcript.

## Creating a transcript

- **Transcript.Entry**: An entry in a transcript.
- **Transcript.Segment**: The types of segments that may be included in a transcript entry.

items.description: The types of segments that may be included in a transcript entry.
items.name: Transcript.Segment
